channel.title: Tables do not move horizontally
channel.description:
### Issue Summary
We are just migrated to Redash Onprem. The queries were migrated without a problem, only what happens to us with the result tables, that in the previously hosted redash the tables slide vertically and horizontally, but in the redash migrated to onprem they only slide vertically.
I attach an image of the same query and the same browser. What can be?
Thanks and best regards!
### Technical details:
* Redash Version: 8.0.0+b32245 * Browser/OS: Google Chrome. Versión 96.0.4664.45 (Build oficial) (64 bits) * We migrate Redash with the official public procedure
Table before migrating, in Redash online redash.io ![0111|690x335](upload://avEXX931BR03cW4HDm4IxYh34Vn.png)
Table after migrating on our private host. ![0222|690x379](upload://sogHjGRghgyrU8iMX3RofviUHCt.png)
Thanks

item.title: Tables do not move horizontally
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
It’s because you’re running an old version of Redash. You should upgrade to V10 which includes the horizontal scrolling feature. Upgrading takes just a few minutes:

Upgrade from V8 to V10 Walkthrough

Read full topic

item.title: Tables do not move horizontally
item.dc:creator: LeoPonti
item.description:
Issue Summary

We are just migrated to Redash Onprem.
The queries were migrated without a problem, only what happens to us with the result tables, that in the previously hosted redash the tables slide vertically and horizontally, but in the redash migrated to onprem they only slide vertically.

I attach an image of the same query and the same browser.
What can be?

Thanks and best regards!

Technical details:

  • Redash Version: 8.0.0+b32245
  • Browser/OS: Google Chrome. Versión 96.0.4664.45 (Build oficial) (64 bits)
  • We migrate Redash with the official public procedure

Table before migrating, in Redash online redash.io

Table after migrating on our private host.

Thanks

Read full topic
